amendment.description: Amendment sought to add Fair Value Accounting Principles to the EX-IM provision of the underlying bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 9 printed in Part B of House Report 114-326 to the Senate amendment to the text to add Fair Value Accounting Principles to the EX-IM provision of the underlying bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schweikert amendment (A081) Failed by recorded vote: 133 - 295 (Roll no. 615).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Schweikert amendment (A081) Failed by recorded vote: 133 - 295 (Roll no. 615).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A081) offered by Mr. Schweikert.
